channel.title: Kissimmee Planning Advisory Board - Public Notices
channel.description: Public notices for Kissimmee Planning Advisory Board meetings and proceedings

item.title: Miscellaneous Notices - Kissimmee
item.description:
LEGAL ADVERTISEMENT OSCEOLA COUNTY BOARD OF COUNTY COMMISSIONERS PROJECTS: 1) PS-26-15716-PC Design Services for Canoe Creek Road Widening Project
--- Full Notice Text --- LEGAL ADVERTISEMENT OSCEOLA COUNTY BOARD OF COUNTY COMMISSIONERS PROJECTS: 1) PS-26-15716-PC Design Services for Canoe Creek Road Widening Project. There will be a VIRTUAL Non-Mandatory Pre-Proposal Conference via the Microsoft TEAMs application on Tuesday, March 3, 2026, at 10:00 AM Local Time. Dial in at 407-906-2344, and when prompted enter the conference code: 518 149 335#. Deadline for questions is Wednesday, March 11, 2026, at 2:00 PM Local Time. Due Date: Tuesday, March 24, 2026, at 2:00 PM Local Time. Contact: Paul Callaway (407) 742-0932. 2) PS-26-15784-LA - Continuing Planning, Engineering, Architecture, Construction Engineering Inspection and Design Services. Osceola County Board of County Commissioners is seeking proposals from qualified firms to provide Engineering, Construction Engineering and Inspection (CEI) services, Planning, Landscape Architecture, Architecture and Design, and economic consulting and/or advisory services on a Task Authorization basis. The solicitation document and any addenda can be accessed and downloaded from VendorLink at the following web address: Vendorlink.osceola.org. There will be no pre-proposal conference. The deadline for questions is Wednesday, March 4, 2026, at 5:00 PM Local Time. DUE DATE: Tuesday, March 24, 2026, at 2:00 PM Local Time. Contact: Luis Aviles (407) 742-0937. The release date for this solicitation is February 22, 2026. FOR MORE INFORMATION, VISIT OSCEOLA COUNTYS VENDORLINK WEB SITE AT http://vendorlink.osceola.org. February 26, 2026
